subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets built a 3-0 lead, but against the Yankees’ power, it was hardly safe. Raul Ibanez tied the game with a three-run homer two batters before Eric Chavez hit a pinch-hit solo shot to left field.
snippet: The Mets built a 3-0 lead, but against the Yankees’ power, it was hardly safe. Raul Ibanez tied the game with a three-run homer two batters before Eric Chavez hit a pinch-hit solo shot to left field.
